price: Kuma kõ da sun kasance a gabãnin a saukar da shi a kansu, kusa-kusa, sunã baƙin ciki hai bã su iya magana.
arabic: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
